alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 20 at 3:18AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower Washington County and Zion National Park. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lower Washington County; Zion National Park
